page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAMES
page.content: My name is James Johnson and I live at Park End House. When my mum shouts "Breakfast!", I slowly get up and get washed and dressed. It is 8.45 and it will soon be time for school. A short trip in the car and we arrive at school at five to nine. Soon the bell goes and we get on with History till playtime, when we have something to eat. After play I do Maths and if we finish before dinner we can draw a picture. After dinner and a play we have craftwork and then we have a story. We go home at 3 o'clock. When I get home I watch TV with a cup of coffee. My dad comes home in time for tea. I give my dad a game of badminton then I feed the guinea pigs and play with my brother. I go to bed and read a book before going to sleep. I am 8 years old.
